title: Risk & Adventure

questions.text: When faced with a new opportunity, my first instinct is to...
choices: Ask trusted friends for their opinions
Weigh the pros and cons carefully
A planned itinerary in a new city
A relaxing resort with all amenities

questions.text: When trying new foods, I typically...
choices: Order the most unusual item on the menu
Try one new thing alongside familiar favorites
Stick to dishes I know I'll enjoy

questions.text: If I could learn a new skill, I'd choose...
choices: A creative art like painting or music
A practical skill like cooking or woodworking
An intellectual pursuit like a new language

questions.text: My approach to financial decisions is...
choices: Take calculated risks for big rewards
Live in the moment, money comes and goes

description: Find out who's the thrill-seeker and who plays it safe.
